name: The Ninja Gaiden as Interpreted by MiniMacro Sound
name_original: The Ninja Gaiden as Interpreted by MiniMacro Sound
description:
WORLD-FAMOUS CHIPTUNE ARTIST MINIMACRO SOUND PRESENTS HIS INTERPRETATION OF

NINJA GAIDEN

This is a from-the-ground-up reimagining of the first Ninja Gaiden NES game. All of the levels are redesigned from scratch, the soundtrack is entirely remixed, there are new graphics, etc. etc. Play on your Windows computer for free Free video games 2021

I do not own the copyright to Ninja Gaiden or any related assets, nor do I claim to. Ninja Gaiden is a property of Tecmo/Koei.

CRITICS ARE SAYING

  • "this is one of the games that i've played in my ENTIRE life" - CosmicGem
  • "This game has things" - TwistC
  • "also i somehow died with Ryu just staying in the air like this for some reason" - Big Fish

Email me at minimacrodx@gmail.com, or message me on Discord at Quack Man™#0172, if you have any questions. I'm always up to chat.

STREAMERS

If you plan on streaming the game, let me know by email or Twitter or Discord - I'd like to watch you play it!
